definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Chapter three discusses some problems of SVS in syntactic dimension.
sentences.chinese: 第三章論述連動句的句法平面中的若干問題。

sentences.english: Chapter one expounds upon the history and present situation of the studies on SVS .
sentences.chinese: 第一章對連動句研究的歷史和現狀進行了評述。

sentences.english: Chapter four discusses some problems of SVS in semantic dimension.
sentences.chinese: 第四章論述連動句的語義平面中的若干問題。

sentences.english: Then, angels appeared, and made the monster motionless.
sentences.chinese: 接着，天使們就來了，他們讓冰怪連動都動不了。

sentences.english: Three rows of even the "dynamism" of the mobile flowers, tension, stronger, intensity is better.
sentences.chinese: 三排連動網花，拉力更強，強度更好。

sentences.english: Upper and lower die design of synchronized lifting Linked bar.
sentences.chinese: 上下模設計連動倒杆同步升降。

sentences.english: My ears were hurting and I could hardly move my fingers at all.
sentences.chinese: 我的耳朵疼得厲害，手上的指頭連動都動不了。

definition: variant of 熱衷|热衷[re4 zhong1]
preparedness/to bring sth to a state of readiness
to kill two birds with one stone (idiom)
to decide/to determine/established practice/(dialect) firmly resolved (to do sth)
to make a sound effect/sound effect/(historical linguistics) to reconstruct the sound system of an archaic language
to impair/to degrade/to decrease/to reduce/to weaken/to detract from/impairment (e.g. of financial assets)
to be equal to/to be well-matched/rival
